class.name: DialogOwner
class.javadoc:
Class DialogOwner is a printing attribute class that identifies the window that owns the print dialog.

IPP Compatibility: This is not an IPP attribute.

Construct a new dialog type selection enumeration value with the given integer value.
value Integer value.
Returns the string table for class DialogOwner.

Get the printing attribute class which is to be used as the "category" for this printing attribute value.

For class DialogOwner the category is class DialogOwner itself. Printing attribute class (category), an instance of class{@link java.lang.Class java.lang.Class}.

Get the name of the category of which this attribute value is an instance.

For class DialogOwner the category name is "dialog-owner". Attribute category name.
